original: Hañci saha upapattiyā sotāpanno na hoti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Hañci saha upapattiyā sakadāgāmī na hoti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Hañci saha upapattiyā anāgāmī na hoti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Sāriputto thero na saha upapattiyā arahāti?
Hañci sāriputto thero na saha upapattiyā arahā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
mahāpanthako thero na saha upapattiyā arahāti?
Hañci mahāpanthako thero na saha upapattiyā arahā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Upapattesiyena cittena arahattaṁ sacchikaroti lokiyena sāsavena …pe… saṅkilesiyenāti?
analyzed: ▁upa patt esi y ena ▁citt ena ▁arahattaṃ ▁sacchikar oti ▁lokiy ena ▁s āsav ena ▁pe ▁saṃkiles iy enāti

original: Upapattesiyaṁ cittaṁ niyyānikaṁ khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavaṁ …pe…
analyzed: ▁upa patt esi yaṃ ▁cittaṃ ▁ niyyānik aṃ ▁khay a gāmī ▁ bodh a gāmī ▁apa ca ya gāmī ▁an āsav aṃ ▁pe

original: Nanu upapattesiyaṁ cittaṁ aniyyānikaṁ na khayagāmi na bodhagāmi na apacayagāmi sāsavaṁ …pe…
analyzed: ▁nanu ▁upa patt esi yaṃ ▁cittaṃ ▁a niyyānik aṃ ▁na ▁khay a gāmi ▁na ▁ bodh a gāmi ▁na ▁apa ca ya gāmi ▁s āsav aṃ ▁pe

original: Hañci upapattesiyaṁ cittaṁ aniyyānikaṁ na khayagāmi na bodhagāmi na apacayagāmi sāsavaṁ …pe… saṅkilesiyaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: ▁hañci ▁upa patt esi yaṃ ▁cittaṃ ▁a niyyānik aṃ ▁na ▁khay a gāmi ▁na ▁ bodh a gāmi ▁na ▁apa ca ya gāmi ▁s āsav aṃ ▁pe ▁saṃkiles iyaṃ ▁no ▁ca ▁vata ▁ re ▁vattabbe

original: Upapattesiyena cittena rāgaṁ pajahati, dosaṁ pajahati, mohaṁ pajahati, anottappaṁ pajahatīti?
analyzed: ▁upa patt esi y ena ▁citt ena ▁rāg aṃ ▁pajahati ▁dos aṃ ▁pajahati ▁moh aṃ ▁pajahati ▁an o t tapp aṃ ▁pajah atīti

original: Upapattesiyaṁ cittaṁ maggo … satipaṭṭhānaṁ …pe… sammappadhānaṁ … iddhipādo … indriyaṁ … balaṁ … bojjhaṅgoti?
analyzed: ▁upa patt esi yaṃ ▁cittaṃ ▁maggo ▁satipaṭṭhān aṃ ▁pe ▁sammappadhān aṃ ▁iddhipād o ▁indriy aṃ ▁bal aṃ ▁bojjhaṃg oti

original: Upapattesiyena cittena dukkhaṁ parijānāti, samudayaṁ pajahati, nirodhaṁ sacchikaroti, maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
analyzed: ▁upa patt esi y ena ▁citt ena ▁dukkhaṃ ▁parijānāti ▁samuday aṃ ▁pajahati ▁nirodh aṃ ▁sacchikar oti ▁maggaṃ ▁bhāv etīti
